articleContent:
Dear Rover:

The pre-download for CBT2 is now available. Qualified applicants can download the client and some resources in advance through the following ways:

1. Go to the [Closed Beta II] recruitment page and log in with the same account information you used when filling out the Recruitment Questionnaire. Click the [Check Qualification] button to confirm the result. If qualified, click the [Download & Install] button and follow the instructions provided for pre-download.

>>>Link: https://wutheringwaves.kurogame.com/en/cbt

2. Check the email address you provided in the Recruitment Questionnaire. Qualified applicants will receive an email with instructions for completing the pre-download process.


✦Official Customer Service Contact✦

If you have any questions during the pre-download process, please contact our customer service: wutheringwaves_ensupport@kurogame.com


Closed Beta II is scheduled to start on 2024/2/19 at 10:00 (UTC+8). Qualified applicants can log in to the game on the specified platform using the same login method as when filling out the Recruitment Questionnaire. If you come across a "Waiting for Test Opening" prompt when launching the game, it indicates that CBT2 has not started yet. Please be patient and wait for its official opening.

Thank you for your continuous attention and support for Wuthering Waves!



Wuthering Waves Dev Team
articleTitle: Wuthering Waves Closed Beta II Pre-download Instructions
